_header: If it be lost and you it find

BLHar5036.Transcription:
yf yht ys lost and you yt fyndI praye you be so good and kyndas
                    to let her haue her booke agayneand you shall haue no worssebut
                    apennye to put an your purs

BLAdd39659.Transcription:
If it be loste & you it findeI pray you heartlie be so
                    kindeAs for to take a litel payneTo send me my boke home
                    againe
BLAdd39659.Editions:
Catalogue of additions to the manuscripts in the British Museum in the
                years 1916-1920….
         [London]: the Trustees of the British Museum, 1933: 137.
Bergen,  Henry,
                        ed.  
             Lydgate’s Fall of Princes.
             4 vols. 
             EETS
